title: Greta Van Susteren - Wikipedia
snippet: Greta Conway Van Susteren (born June 11, 1954) is an American journalist, lawyer, and television news anchor for Newsmax TV. She was previously on CNN, Fox News, and MSNBC. She hosted Fox News's On the Record w/ Greta Van Susteren for 14 years (2002–2016) before departing for MSNBC, where ...

title: Greta Van Susteren: MSNBC Only Network That Ever Tried to Control My Show | Barrett Media
snippet: She later hosted a syndicated talk show for Gray Television before ultimately joining Newsmax in 2022. At Newsmax, Greta Van Susteren anchors the 6 PM ET newscast called The Record with Greta Van Susteren.

title: Greta Van Susteren Signs New Deal With Newsmax
snippet: The show, based in Washington, D.C., airs at 6 p.m. ET, kicking off the network’s nighttime lineup. Her show debuted on the network in 2022. Van Susteren provided legal analysis for the O.J. Simpson murder trial, launching her career as a ...
